def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_sum = arr[1]
    current_sum = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum + arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_sum = arr[-1]
    current_sum = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum + arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_sum = arr[0]
    current_sum = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum - arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum

def max_subarray_sum(arr):
    max_sum = arr[0]
    current_sum = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, len(arr)):
        current_sum = max(arr[i], current_sum * arr[i])
        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)
    return max_sum
